last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's the last weekend of the season on the White Isle, and while Jordan is contemplating his future as a rep, the rest of the team is getting ready for the final set of guests.

name: The Ibiza Weekender
overview: The Weekender is back! In this new series, we say adios to Magaluf and hola to Europe’s number one glamorous party island Ibiza. There’s a brand new hotel rigged with cameras, capturing all the shenanigans and antics of our new holiday reps as they revel in th

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: It's the start of another season on the party island. Head Rep David is busy gathering his team of reps to give the guests the weekend of their lives.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Two sets of young guests check into the hotel hoping to have a weekend to remember.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The guests checking in this week are some Geordie lads celebrating a 21st birthday and former Playboy Bunnies, Natalie and Lucie.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Deano breaks his casual conquest rule as he asks Imogen out on a romantic date. Her world ends up being rocked though after her ex lover and ex colleague Jordan shows up at the resort. Ben continues to cause tensions and Imogen asks Jordan to stay on as a rep to help her tame him.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Jordan puts on the Ibiza uniform and bonds with his fellow male reps. He then attempts to calm Ben’s boozy behaviour and later encourages Deano to dump Imogen and join him, Ben and Kris with the four new girls on the block.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Tensions rise between the reps as a divide starts between Team Imogen and Team Jordan, culminating in a night of arguing between Imogen, Deano and Jordan

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Things come to a head as Imogen loses her cool and decides to step down as head rep. Who will replace her, and will it relieve the tension among the reps?

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Imogen finds out that Jordan is after Rachael and they don’t hold back as it comes to saying how they feel. Ben receives a surprise visit from his Nan who is worried about his . drinking. Deano comforts an upset Imogen

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview:
The new series focuses on the comings and goings at a single Ibiza hotel. Each episode follows the fun, flirtatious and sometimes outrageous lives of Ibiza holiday reps – Jordan, Imogen, Deano, Ellie, Amelia and David.

 

From check-in to check out, the series follows the fortunes of new groups of guests as they soak up the sun, look for romance and plunge into the nightlife in the island’s hotspots.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Ibiza Weekender focuses on the comings and goings at a single Ibiza hotel. Each episode follows the fun, flirtatious and sometimes outrageous lives of Ibiza holiday reps.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Ibiza Weekender focuses on the comings and goings at a single Ibiza hotel. Each episode follows the fun, flirtatious and sometimes outrageous lives of Ibiza holiday reps.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Ibiza Weekender focuses on the comings and goings at a single Ibiza hotel. Each episode follows the fun, flirtatious and sometimes outrageous lives of Ibiza holiday reps.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Ibiza Weekender focuses on the comings and goings at a single Ibiza hotel. Each episode follows the fun, flirtatious and sometimes outrageous lives of Ibiza holiday reps.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Imogen decides she needs to come clean to her boyfriend about kissing Deano. David makes a shocking decision about one rep's future.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Having sacked a rep and demoted Jordan, David is determined to create his dream team, but how will the other reps cope as Ellie returns as assistant head rep?

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: With two reps gone and Jordan and Ellie battling for supremacy, it looks like David's dream team is a thing of the past. David doles out some tough love to Deano.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: David sets out to strengthen the team with some unorthodox training. Ellie takes control. Deano and Imogen try to figure out exactly what they mean to each other.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Former guest Bethan returns as a rep, but will her presence prove too much of a distraction for Jordan? Deano and Imogen look set to finally get their act together.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: In the final episode this series, it is decision time as Deano and Imogen finally get some time together away from the madness, but what does that mean for their future together? Has Bethan finally given up on changing Jordan’s womanising ways or has the Welsh ladies’ man decided that the Geordie beauty could be a keeper? Guests Darcie, Sophie, Callum, Webber and Max waste no time as they go on a pulling mission.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview:
Party girl Marlie is first to join the team and quickly bonds with newbie Molly, a disastrous-dating brickie. But it's final new girl Chyna that makes the biggest impression on lothario Jordan – as he quickly singles her out as rep romance potential.

With a new massage qualification under his belt, pint sized muscle man Deano is keen to get his hands on the guests and prove he can avoid the drama of relationships at all. With the guests' arrival, it's not long before he's attempting to put this into practice.

With David on hand to lead the way, Marlie and Mollie are soon getting the hang of rep life showing how to cater to guests and yet still have fun. But Chyna struggles juggling Jordan's attention and her job as a rep. With feedback from the guests to come at the end of the weekend, she will have to raise her game to avoid coming under the eye of El Jefe.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview:
With the new girl reps settling into Ibiza life under the watchful eyes of old pros Jordan and Deano, Head rep David has a surprise for the team. Under the guise of a cocktail masterclass he unveils his 7th and final rep – Cocktail maestro Callum.

With the new guests arriving, Callum is thrown into the deep end and gets to work. But it's not just cocktails he is stirring, as Deano starts to feel even less noticeable with another fit guy on the team. Although Deano takes a liking to one of the farming girl guests, he is knocked again with the arrival of super fit Brummie boy guests. New rep Marley can't keep her eyes off them – especially when they strip off their tops in a sexy torso showdown.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Following last week’s shock departure of Deano from the team, Head Rep David is hoping the remaining reps will pull together to give the guests a weekend they will never forget, But its not long before some of them are more focused on each other than the job in hand. With the arrival of the boy guests, brothers Luke and Zak, Jordan finds himself with some competition for Chyna. Determined to keep his budding romance on track he makes it his mission to wingman the boys away from Chyna, as well as surprise her with a date of his own making but just how will Chyna take to the fake flowers and tea candles?Meanwhile new boy rep Callum develops feelings for fellow rep Molly and he attempts to make those feelings known – but after he drunkenly kisses one of the girl guests it might be over before it’s started.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: In this week’s explosive Ibiza Weekender head rep David and his team have their hands full following the arrival of a couple of hot older boys and sexually confident girls set pulses racing all around the hotel. Girl guest Sofia arrives with her sights set on Jordan but after a fruitless first night she turns her considerable attention to boy guest Devante. Luckily rep Marlie is quite happy to keep fellow guest Rob company.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: This week on the White Isle, head rep David is determined to bring a measure of local flavour to the rep team with Spanish and Flamenco lessons. Meanwhile, reps Jordan and Chyna are clearly speaking different languages as cracks appear in their relationship – just as a family member arrives for a holiday.With the arrival of a couple of pocket rocket boy guests Chyna is determined to impress and improve her feedback, and when her sister and best friend arrive, her luck certainly seems to in. But how will Jordan cope with a grilling from the two Essex girls – especially after a jealous outburst on a night out spells the potential end to the relationship?With Callum going from strength to strength as a rep, Jordan is left trying to mend his mistakes, win over Chyna and gain the approval of her sister. With the rep’s struggling to work as a team, head rep David now has one relationship clearly in his sights.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Following last weekend’s drama, and with HR breathing down his neck, Head rep David decides to crack down on the reps. The whole team are all hoping to have a better weekend, But the arrival of a surprise guest for Jordan throws them into chaos yet again.With ‘El grand jefe’ on David’s back to make changes to the team he is keeping a close eye on all reps. Behind Marlie’s back, the team are all starting to vent their frustrations with her gossiping and unprofessionalism. Especially when Marlie lets slip to the guests about Jordan and Chyna’s relationship – is she really a team player?

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The Weekender team welcome new arrival Austin just as Callum faces his biggest dilemma so far and Jordan raises his game.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: This week sees another new rep arrival – Head rep David decides he needs some more experienced members in the team and calls on ex rep Hayley. She’s got a new look, more experience and has made it her mission to become number one rep whatever it takes.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Head rep David finally has a full team of reps again and is determined to keep them on track, especially the newly reunited Jordan and Chyna. Following another bad set of scores David has kicked Chyna out of her room and put her in the communal area – hoping she will focus more on the job. But with the arrival of the girl guests, romance is once again put to the test.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: It’s the final episode of the series and following last week’s shock firing of Jordan all the reps are in the line of fire – especially when El Jefe, David, kicks off the weekend with a fire drill to keep them sharp. Chyna and Austin are both missing Jordan but its not long before a new set of guests arrive and they throw themselves into the job – Chyna in particular is hoping to prove she is capable.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: David is joined by rep veteran Jordan and last year’s standout Callum. With the arrival of the three new female reps it is clear the old heads won’t get everything their own way.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: David is joined by rep veteran Jordan and last year’s standout Callum. With the arrival of the three new female reps it is clear the old heads won’t get everything their own way.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: There's a naughty secret in the hotel this weekend. After sharing a kiss behind everyone's back last week, Jordan and Chloe have decided to brush the truth under the carpet and try to move on. Jordan is now focussed on taking his relationship with Isobel to the next level, while Callum and Chloe are trying to work out just what their relationship is and where it's going.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: There’s a guilty secret hanging over the hotel this week as a new set of guests jet in. Chloe is still struggling with the truth of what she and Jordan got up to.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: After Chloe’s bombshell last time, love is in the air this weekend in Ibiza, but Jordan’s attempts to win back Isobel’s heart quickly go awry when guest Katy catches his eye.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: El Jefe David's efforts at online dating finally pay off, bringing old flame Zac to the hotel and leading to a loved-up day out for our Head Rep.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: There’s an exciting new development at the hotel this week as El Jefe sets up a customer services desk, and it’s not long before its put into action.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: It’s all change on the white Isle this week as El Jefe’s ban on rep romances starts to take effect, while Callum is still reeling from Chloe’s shock departure.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: There’s a fresh face in the hotel this weekend as David’s new recruit Nicola joins the team. Her history with Jordan causes Isobel yet more worries even though they’re not supposed to be a thing anymore. Callum is faced with a tough test when old flame Catherine arrives as a guest. How does he keep her happy when he doesn’t want to go behind Chloe’s back, but El jefe’s rules mean he can’t tell the guests he’s not single. No such problem for Savvas who shows guest Georgie a weekend to remember, earning the job of Assistant Head Rep in the process. So who’s got Savvas’ old tabard? Well after a weekend in which Isobel has been more focussed on Jordan than the guests she gets demoted to trainee and has to wear the tabard as well.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: As the season draws to a close new assistant head rep Savvas is starting to make his mark, though he’s already made quite an impression on Nicola. Just a pity she’s a rep. Not that the rep romance rule is going to stop Jordan and Isobel. Even though she’s now on probation they’re still sneaking kisses behind El jefe’s back. When man-mountain guest Alex turns up and takes a shine to Isobel will it cause a problem for their secret romance? There’s also a surprise in store for Callum when Chloe returns to ask “what are we?” However it’s El Jefe who’s got the biggest surprise of the weekend, heading off on a date and leaving Savvas in charge.Is this a chance for the new assistant to change the rules?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: It's the start of another season on the party island of Ibiza and with the holidaymakers making ready for a summer of fun Head Rep David is busy gathering his team of reps to give the guests the weekend of their lives. With a new team ethos in place of ‘back to basics, guests come first' will David be able to keep his crew focused on the job in hand?

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: It's the start of another season on the party island. Head Rep David is busy gathering his team of reps to give the guests the weekend of their lives.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: El Jefe puts pressure on Callum and Tash to come clean over their secret.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: David lays down the law as the hotel welcomes its first hen party.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A determined El Jefe plans to get tough on the team and end all the recent dramas.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Jordan is even more excited than normal as it's his birthday, and while he's told everyone about it, does David have anything planned?

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Callum's career is on the line and he needs to impress El Jefe, otherwise he's going home. Plus, it's El Jefe's turn for a bit of romance as love comes a-knocking.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: It's nearly the end of the party season on the White Isle, and just when things seem to finally be going El Jefe's way, disaster strikes as the team are out on a beach bonding day.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: It's the last weekend of the season on the White Isle, and while Jordan is contemplating his future as a rep, the rest of the team is getting ready for the final set of guests.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: It's the start of another season on the party island. Head Rep David is busy gathering his team of reps to give the guests the weekend of their lives.
